en.levelText1: The position of a digit in the number is known as the place.
en.levelText2: To round to any place, you need to know what place your rounding to.
en.levelText3: Find the place value (the 'rounding digit') and look at the digit just to the right of it.
en.levelText4: If that digit is less than 5, do not change the rounding digit but drop all digits to the right of it. 62 becomes 60
en.levelText5: If that digit is greater than or equal to 5, you increase the value of the digit you're rounding to by one (+1). 68 becomes 70. Since the place value is tens.
en.levelText6: If you have only 25 to buy items for this shop.
en.levelText7: And you need to add together the price of the items you choose, to make sure the money is enough. We use Estimation.
en.levelText8: Rounding is a way to estimate. Rounding is grounded in a procedure.
en.levelText9: Estimating is grounded in understanding. For example, 0.24 rounds to 0.2 but is more useful when estimated to 0.25
en.levelText10: Rounding decimals is useful for estimating calculations with decimals or for approximating solutions.
en.game3: Hit the box that correctly rounds to the nearest hundreth.
en.start3: Fill In the boxes with the correct prices that round to the nearest thousandth.
en.example2: rounded to the nearest tenth is
en.howToPlay: This game is very easy to play. You're first introduced to a car game, where you dodge obstacles and hit the right boxes. Then a fill in the box type of practise game is introduced, followed by a drag and drop game. Good Luck!
en.story5: I think I left them at the shop. Let's drive to the shop, I will teach you how to round to any place along the way.
en.story4: Thank you for making out time to visit my shops. I reckon you learned a lot too. Well, this is where we part. See you next time.
en.game2: Hit the box that correctly rounds to the nearest tenth.
en.example1: rounded to the nearest tens is
en.start2: Fill In the boxes with the correct prices that round to the nearest whole number.
en.game1: Hit the box that correctly rounds to the nearest tens.
en.story1: Hi, I need your help. I can't find my pets anywhere.
en.story3: There is only one pet left. Lets check the last shop i think we can find it there.
en.gameover: Try again. Click the 'help' button for assistance.

en.story2: You're really good at this. I knew you were the right person for this. Let's check the next shop too.
en.numberline: Drag and Place the coin where it should appear in the numberline.
en.start1: Fill In the boxes with the correct prices that round to the nearest tens
en.guide1: 134.9 rounded to nearest tens is 130 as the next digit (4) is less than 5
en.guide2: 1.2735 rounded to nearest tenths is 1.3 as the next digit (7) is 5 or more
en.guide3: 3.1416 rounded to nearest hundredths is 3.14 as the next digit (1) is less than 5
en.guide4: 15.239 rounded to nearest whole number is 15 as the next digit (2) is less than 5
en.faq2: Round to the nearest Whole Number
